titleStmt.title: A narrative of the proceedings of a great councel of Jews assembled in the plain of Ageda in Hungaria ... to examine the Scriptures concerning Christ, on the 12th of October 1650 / by Samuel Brett, there present ; also a relation of some other observations in his travels beyond the seas ...
titleStmt.author: Brett, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
